thread.title: Acommodations near Tholpetty or Mudumalai parks
thread.title_full: Acommodations near Tholpetty or Mudumalai parks

author: Camille Coudert
title: Acommodations near Tholpetty or Mudumalai parks
text: # 1 Hello ! I am a 25 years old french student, me and 3 others girls vould life to go to the wayanad wildlife sanctuary and among other things to visit the parc tholpetty by trekking. I am looking for a nice place to stay, where it will be easy to organize our activities and where 4 women would feel safe. We would like to go there on the 10th of August Do you have any advices ? Guest houses you liked ?? Thank you very much !
